Translations.Text: Hakuiki araku shingeki suru (uma) ni oite (chikau)
(teki no) gunzei no mattadanaka ni totsunyū suru toki
Hontōni ningen wa, jibun no omo ni taishi onshirazudearu
Sore ni tsuki, kare wa makotoni shōnindeari
mata tomi o aisuru koto ni netchū suru
Kare wa haka no naka no mono ga abaki dasa reru toki no koto o shiranai no ka
Mata mune no naka ni aru mono ga, bakuro sa reru no o
Hontōni omo wa, sonohi, kare-ra ni tsuite subete shitte ora reru
